# Pull Request Template

## Summary

Provide a clear and concise description of the change.

## Files Changed

List the files modified in this pull request. State the domain (sensors,
templates, dashboards, themes, docs, assets, repo structure).

## Type of Change

Select one:

- Documentation
- Example YAML
- Experiment
- Asset update
- Repo structure
- Bug fix
- Feature
- Improvement

## Scope Check

Confirm:

- This PR modifies only one conceptual domain.
- No crossâ€‘domain edits were made.
- No destructive changes were introduced.

## Motivation

Explain why this change is needed or valuable.

## Implementation Notes

Add any relevant details about how the change was made.

## Documentation

If this change affects architecture or workflow:

- Update `docs/development.md`
- Update any other relevant documentation

## Changelog

Add an entry to `CHANGELOG.md` under the correct date.

## Additional Notes

Include any extra context, screenshots, or considerations.
